r.s: Provides missing functionality for older versions of PHP
r.d: PHP_Compat provides missing functionality in the form of Constants and Functions for older versions of PHP.
r.n:
Added more components: * array_diff_key * array_diff_ukey * array_diff_uassoc * array_intersect_assoc * array_intersect_key * array_intersect_uassoc * array_intersect_ukey * floatval * ini_get_all * md5_file * clone * PHP_EOL * UPLOAD_ERR (File upload constants) * T (Tokenizer constants)
Added loadVersion(): * Allows automatic loading of all components * or, loading all components until a given version of PHP is reached.
